LocaleResource.Value: Adds Twitter authentication to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Twitter authentication:

  • Create a new app on Twitter of type Twitter.
  • Enter the access data (App-ID & App-Secret) in the form below.
  • Enter the URL listed below in Apps > App settings > Authentication settings > Callback URLs.
  • Activate the option Request email address from users
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.
